properties.description: If application transitioned from “Background” to “Inactive” state prior to foregrounding (as opposed to from “Not Running” state). Automatically collected on iOS only.

properties.name: url
properties.description: The value of UIApplicationLaunchOptionsURLKey from launchOptions (auto-collected on iOS only)

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version installed

events.title: Application Uninstalled
events.description: User uninstalls the application Often collected automatically!

events.title: Application Updated
events.description: User updates the app Collected automatically!

properties.description: Build number of the installed app

properties.name: previous_build
properties.description: Previously recorded build

properties.name: previous_version
properties.description: Previously recorded version

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version installed

events.title: Video Ad Completed
events.description: The ad content completes playing

properties.name: ad_asset_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the ad asset.

properties.name: ad_load_type
properties.description: Linear if ads are same for all users.

properties.name: ad_pod_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the ad pod.

properties.name: ad_pod_position
properties.description: Position of the ad asset relative to other assets in the same pod.

properties.name: ad_position
properties.description: The current index position in seconds of the playhead with respect to the length of the ad.

properties.name: ad_publisher
properties.description: The ad creator, author, producer, or publisher.

properties.name: ad_title
properties.description: The title of the video ad.

properties.name: ad_type
properties.description: The ad type

properties.name: session_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the overall session.

properties.name: total_ad_length
properties.description: The total duration of the current ad asset in seconds.

events.title: Video Content Completed
events.description: The video content finishes playing

properties.name: airdate
properties.description: ISO 8601 Date String for the original air date or published date.

properties.name: bitrate
properties.description: The current kbps.

properties.name: channel
properties.description: The channel in which the video content is playing

properties.name: content_asset_id
properties.description: Asset Id of the video playing/about to be played

properties.name: content_pod_id
properties.description: Pod Id of the video playing/about to be played

properties.name: description
properties.description: Short description of the video content.

properties.name: episode
properties.description: The episode number if applicable.

properties.name: framerate
properties.description: The average fps.

properties.name: full_episode
properties.description: true if content is a full episode and false otherwise.

properties.name: genre
properties.description: The genre of the content, ie. ‘comedy’, ‘action’.

properties.name: keywords
properties.description: Arbitrary keywords/tags that describe/categorize the content.

properties.name: livestream
properties.description: True f the playback will be a livetream

properties.name: position
properties.description: Position of product in the list

properties.name: program
properties.description: The name of the program, show, etc. of the content if applicable.

properties.name: publisher
properties.description: The content creator, author, producer, or publisher.

properties.name: season
properties.description: The season number if applicable.

properties.name: session_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the overall session.

properties.name: title
properties.description: User's salutation

properties.name: total_length
properties.description: Total duration of the playback in seconds
